comments.body: Why is this only a requirement of OSX? Given a minimal python/debian Docker container we might want to install those as well.

In OSX byobu does not work at all with the bundled BSD utils, e.g. readlink is not functional.

I think it would be better to leave that as optional on Linux, i.e. if you are building a minimal python/Debian container it is probably better to just add `coreutils` to the list of packages in the environment.

What do you think?

Your call :-) its not a common use case so feel free to merge!

Thanks!
